SEARCH
Package com.veeva.generic.keywords

Interface NonSeleniumKeywords

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericKeywords
public interface NonSeleniumKeywords
Interface defining non-Selenium related utility methods. This includes operations like property retrieval, file writing, date manipulation, and CSV generation.
